# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Vs_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Vs)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
VsPluginInfo.C
VsCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
VsPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
VsMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtVsFileFormat.C
avtVsOptions.C
VsFilter.C
VsLog.C
VsMDMesh.C
VsMDVariable.C
VsMesh.C
VsRectilinearMesh.C
VsSchema.C
VsStructuredMesh.C
VsUniformMesh.C
VsUnstructuredMesh.C
VsUtils.C
VsVariable.C
VsVariableWithMesh.C
VsRegistry.C
VsRegistryObject.C
VsGroup.C
VsObject.C
VsDataset.C
VsAttribute.C
VsFile.C
VsReader.C
VsStaggeredField.C
HighOrderUnstructuredData.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
VsEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtVsFileFormat.C
avtVsOptions.C
VsFilter.C
VsLog.C
VsMDMesh.C
VsMDVariable.C
VsMesh.C
VsRectilinearMesh.C
VsSchema.C
VsStructuredMesh.C
VsUniformMesh.C
VsUnstructuredMesh.C
VsUtils.C
VsVariable.C
VsVariableWithMesh.C
VsRegistry.C
VsRegistryObject.C
VsGroup.C
VsObject.C
VsDataset.C
VsAttribute.C
VsFile.C
VsReader.C
HighOrderUnstructuredData.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IVsDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IVsDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IVsDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MVsDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MVsDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MVsDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MVsDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EVsDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVsDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EVsDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVsDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EVsDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EVsDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EVsDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EVsDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Vs ${INSTALLTARGETS})
